title: Ceiling Pro mobile-first service booking website with admin dashboard (no email notifications)

requirements.text: Build a mobile-first, premium marketing website for the interior services brand “Ceiling Pro” with a clean white/natural look: fresh white background, soft light-grey sections, light beige + soft natural green accents, elegant modern sans-serif typography, spacious layout with lots of white space, smooth scroll/section reveal animations, and fast-loading responsive layout optimized for smartphones.

quotes:
Create a premium, ultra mobile-friendly service booking website for my interior service brand.

Business Name: Ceiling Pro

DESIGN STYLE:
- Mobile-first design (optimize for smartphones first)
- White, fresh, natural background
- Soft light grey sections
- Light beige / soft natural green accent colors
- Clean modern typography (use elegant sans-serif font)
- Spacious layout with lots of white space
- Minimal, premium, professional feel
- Smooth scrolling animations
- Fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: All primary pages/sections render correctly on common mobile widths (e.g., 360px) with a mobile-first layout.
Site uses white/natural palette and maintains consistent typography/spacing across sections.
Scroll/section animations are subtle and do not block interaction or significantly impact performance.

requirements.text: Implement the homepage hero section with a bright modern ceiling interior background image, headline “Affordable & Premium False Ceiling Services”, subheadline “Starting at ₹65 per sq.ft – Book Expert Consultation Online”, and two CTA buttons: “Book Consultation” (opens/scrolls to booking form) and “Call Now” (click-to-call).

quotes:
HERO SECTION:
- Bright modern ceiling interior background
- Headline:
  "Affordable & Premium False Ceiling Services"
- Subheadline:
  "Starting at ₹65 per sq.ft – Book Expert Consultation Online"
- Two buttons:
  [Book Consultation]
  [Call Now]

acceptanceCriteria: Hero renders background image with readable overlay text on mobile.
Book Consultation button brings user to booking section/form.
Call Now button triggers a tel: link configured in one place (constant/config).

requirements.text: Add a services section that displays exactly 4 service cards with soft shadow, each containing an icon, short description, starting price (or inspection-based text), and a “Book Now” button that leads to the booking form with that service preselected.

quotes:
SERVICES SECTION (ONLY 4):

1. POP & Gypsum False Ceiling
   Starting at ₹65 per sq.ft
   Short description: Elegant and cost-effective ceiling designs for homes and offices.

2. PVC Ceiling Installation
   Starting at ₹110 per sq.ft
   Short description: Durable, waterproof and low maintenance ceiling solutions.

3. Wall Molding & Decorative Panels
   Starting at ₹100 per sq.ft
   Short description: Modern decorative wall molding for premium interiors.

4. Gypsum Ceiling Repairing
   Inspection based pricing
   Short description: Crack repair, redesign and ceiling restoration services.

Each card must include:
- Icon
- Short description
- Starting price clearly visible
- Book Now button

acceptanceCriteria: Exactly 4 service cards are shown with the specified titles/descriptions/pricing text.
Each card shows an icon and a Book Now button.
Clicking Book Now preselects the chosen service in the booking form.

requirements.text: Add a “How it works” section showing a simple 3-step process with icons: (1) Book Your Slot Online, (2) Site Visit & Final Estimate, (3) Professional Installation & Clean Finish.

quotes:
HOW IT WORKS SECTION:

Simple 3 Step Process with icons:

1. Book Your Slot Online
2. Site Visit & Final Estimate
3. Professional Installation & Clean Finish

acceptanceCriteria: The 3 steps are displayed in order with icons and readable labels on mobile.

requirements.text: Implement a booking system UI section with a booking form containing fields: Full Name, Mobile Number, Location, Property Type (Flat/Office/Shop), Select Service (4 services), Select Date (calendar), Select Time Slot (restricted to 10:00 AM, 1:00 PM, 4:00 PM, 7:00 PM and only those enabled), Enter Area in Square Feet, and Submit. After submission, show an on-page confirmation message.

quotes:
BOOKING SYSTEM:

Allow only 4 fixed time slots per day:
• 10:00 AM
• 1:00 PM
• 4:00 PM
• 7:00 PM

Booking Form Fields:
- Full Name
- Mobile Number
- Location
- Property Type (Flat / Office / Shop)
- Select Service (Dropdown – 4 services)
- Select Date (Calendar)
- Select Time Slot (Only 4 options)
- Enter Area in Square Feet
- Submit Button

After submission:
- Show confirmation message
- Save booking in admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Booking form enforces required fields and only allows the 4 fixed time slots (subject to enabled/disabled state).
Submitting a valid booking persists it in the backend and shows a confirmation message without a full page reload.
Admin dashboard reflects the newly created booking.

requirements.text: Create backend persistence and APIs for: (a) creating a booking record, (b) listing all bookings for the admin dashboard, (c) editing service pricing, and (d) enabling/disabling each of the 4 daily time slots (global setting).

quotes:
ADMIN PANEL:
- View all bookings
- Edit service pricing
- Enable/Disable time slots
- Export booking list

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores bookings with all submitted fields plus a created-at timestamp.
Backend exposes methods to get/set the 4 service prices and to get/set enabled flags for the 4 time slots.
When a time slot is disabled in backend settings, it is not selectable in the booking form UI.

requirements.text: Build an admin panel UI that allows: viewing all bookings in a table (with sorting by created date), editing the 4 service rates, enabling/disabling each of the 4 fixed time slots, and exporting the booking list to a downloadable CSV file.

quotes:
ADMIN PANEL:
- View all bookings
- Edit service pricing
- Enable/Disable time slots
- Export booking list

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page shows a bookings table including at least: name, phone, location, property type, service, date, time slot, area, created-at.
Admin can edit and save the 4 service rates and see the estimate calculator and booking UI reflect updated rates.
Admin can enable/disable each slot and the booking form updates accordingly.
Export produces a valid CSV download containing all bookings.

requirements.text: Add a live estimate calculator section with inputs: Area in Square Feet and Select Service. Compute estimated cost as Area × Service Rate for POP & Gypsum (₹65 default), PVC (₹110 default), Wall Molding (₹100 default); for Gypsum Repair show the message “Final estimate after inspection”. Update the result instantly without page reload.

quotes:
LIVE ESTIMATE CALCULATOR SECTION:

User Inputs:
- Area in Square Feet
- Select Service

Pricing Logic:
POP & Gypsum False Ceiling – ₹65 per sq.ft
PVC Ceiling – ₹110 per sq.ft
Wall Molding – ₹100 per sq.ft
Gypsum Repair – Show message: "Final estimate after inspection"

Display:
Estimated Cost = Area × Service Rate

Show result instantly without page reload.

acceptanceCriteria: Changing area or service updates the estimate immediately.
Gypsum Repair selection shows the inspection message instead of a numeric estimate.
Default rates match the specified values and can be overridden by admin-edited pricing.

requirements.text: Add trust/content sections: “Why Choose Ceiling Pro” (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery), a Before & After gallery, a Customer Reviews section, a Contact section, and a clean footer containing phone number, email, and a GST placeholder.

quotes:
TRUST SECTIONS:

- Why Choose Ceiling Pro (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery)
- Before & After Gallery
- Customer Reviews
- Contact Section
- Clean footer with:
  Phone number
  Email
  GST placeholder

acceptanceCriteria: All listed trust/content sections exist on the site and are styled consistently with the premium mobile-first design.
Footer displays phone, email, and a GST placeholder string.

requirements.text: Implement mobile conversion UI elements: a sticky bottom “Book Consultation” button on mobile, a floating WhatsApp button, and a header click-to-call button.

quotes:
Sticky bottom "Book Consultation" button on mobile
- Floating WhatsApp button
- Click-to-call button in header

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile viewports, a sticky bottom Book Consultation CTA remains visible and opens/scrolls to the booking form.
Floating WhatsApp button opens a wa.me link (phone number configurable in one place).
Header call button triggers a tel: link and is accessible (proper aria-label).

requirements.text: Apply on-page SEO basics for the homepage/sections: descriptive title/description meta tags, semantic headings, and content targeting the keywords: “POP false ceiling”, “PVC ceiling installation”, “Wall molding services”, “Gypsum ceiling repair”.

quotes:
SEO OPTIMIZATION:

Optimize for:
“POP false ceiling”
“PVC ceiling installation”
“Wall molding services”
“Gypsum ceiling repair”

acceptanceCriteria: Page includes a meaningful <title> and meta description.
H1/H2 structure is semantic and includes the target keyword phrases naturally in section headings or body text.
Lighthouse SEO checks show no critical SEO errors (where applicable in a SPA context).

requirements.text: Remove/omit the ‘send booking details to admin email’ requirement entirely and ensure no email-sending code paths, UI, or configuration are included in the build.
acceptanceCriteria: No backend methods attempt to send email.
UI does not claim that an email is sent; confirmation only indicates booking submission/received.
No email API keys, SMTP settings, or third-party email integrations exist in the codebase.

requirements.text: Add generated static images to the project and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero uses the generated background image.
Service cards and How-it-works steps use the generated icon assets.
Gallery uses the generated before/after images.

constraints: Do not implement email sending or admin email notifications.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).

Do not modify frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Internet Identity login or role-based authentication for the admin panel (not requested).
Integrations with external databases or third-party APIs beyond basic links (e.g., WhatsApp wa.me, tel:).
Real-time updates via websockets or push notifications.
